short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension to summarise YouTube videos using Summarify.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the offical Summarify extension, it allows users of the iOS app Summarify to use their existing Unlimited subscription from chrome. You need to download Summarify from the iOS App Store and create an account in order to use this extension.
